CustomField.formula: IF(CreatedBy.Profile.Name = "Finisar Partner Community User", "FIN REP Quote", "FIN RSM Quote")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is system generated based on the user or quote creator profile. It will display 'FIN RSM Quote' if the quote creator is an internal employee. It will display 'FIN REP Quote' if the quote creator is an external Sales Rep.
CustomField.label: Quote Type
